alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Nye County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 11:56AM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Lander, northern Nye and southwestern Eureka Counties through 1230 PM PDT... At 1156 AM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 15 miles east of Hickison Summit to 31 miles east of Gillman Springs. Movement was north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Brief heavy rainfall along with gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Antelope Peak. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Nye County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County
